snippet.title: Retro Classix: Joe & Mac Returns - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Bag ‘em and Toss ‘em

Best cave-bros Joe & Mac are back in action! The local cave women have been kidnapped once again, so it’s up to these stone-age superstars to rescue them from the clutches of baddies all across the land. With color-coordinated grass skirts and clubs big enough to send shockwaves at their foes, Joe & Mac have everything they need to bash their way through dinosaurs, robots, aliens, and more!

Joe & Mac return in this frantic and zany single-screen arcade action platformer and spiritual sequel to the arcade classic Tumblepop from Data East™. Each new stage keeps you on your toes with new platform configurations, challenging enemy placements, and hazards to avoid. Stun foes with a shockwave from your club, bag them, and toss them back out to deal damage and turn them into delicious food. Grab your club and get ready to dish out serious prehistoric pain!

Joe & Mac, Joe & Mac Returns, Data East (C) G-Mode Corporation
Published to Steam and GOG by Ziggurat Interactive
Ported by 612 Games

#retrogames #retrogaming #steam #steamgames #steamgame #ziggurat #gmode #612games #delistedgames #delisted #dataeast #retroclassix #joeandmac #joeandmacreturns

NOTE: With PS4 and Nintendo Switch releases already gone, all 12 games in Ziggurat's Retro Classix line (including this one) are going to be delisted on April 30th, 2024, likely due to the license with G-Mode Corporation (who own the Data East IP and back catalogue) expiring. Meanwhile, poor Fighter’s History is still listed as “Coming soon”, a state it’s been in since it was announced alongside the rest of these games in 2021. Not sure what happened to that one, but it's safe to say that its Retro Classix re-release is cancelled.
